sen.j: 安達 義景（あだち よしかげ）は鎌倉時代中期の武将。
sen.e: Yoshikage ADACHI is a busho (Japanese military commander) who lived in the mid Kamakura period.
Yoshikage ADACHI is a busho (Japanese military commander) who lived in the mid Kamakura period.
Yoshikage ADACHI is a busho (Japanese military commander) who lived in the mid Kamakura period.

sen.j: 安達景盛の嫡男。
sen.e: He is a legitimate son of Kagemori ADACHI.
He is the heir of Kagemori ADACHI.
sen.cmt: 「嫡男」→"legitimate son"だと「（庶子ではなく）嫡出子」なので、ここでは跡取りの意味で"heir"が良いと思います。
sen.e: He is the heir of Kagemori ADACHI.

sen.j: 鎌倉幕府の有力御家人。
sen.e: He was a senior vassal of the Kamakura bakufu (Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun).
sen.cmt: 有力御家人: ここでは単数なので、単数形で表記しています。
sen.e: He was a senior vassal of the Kamakura bakufu (Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun).
He was a senior vassal of the Kamakura bakufu (Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun).

sen.j: 子に安達泰盛、覚山尼（北条時宗室）がいる。
sen.e: Yasumori ADACHI and Kakusan ni (wife of Tokimune HOJO) are his children.
sen.cmt: 覚山尼: 用語統一リストに従い、terms欄の訳語からハイフンを削除しました。
sen.e: Yasumori ADACHI and Kakusan ni (wife of Tokimune HOJO) are his children.
Yasumori ADACHI and Kakusan ni (wife of Tokimune HOJO) are his children.

sen.j: 義景の「義」の一字は義景が15歳の元仁元年（1224年）に没した北条義時からの拝領と思われる。
sen.e: It is presumed that the kanji (Chinese characters) '義' used in his first name Yoshikage (義景) was borrowed from the first name of Yoshitoki HOJO (北条義時) who died in 1225 when Yoshikage was 15 years old.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処/「義」の一字: 漢字が問題になっているケースなので、漢字を織り交ぜて訳しています。/元仁元年: グレゴリオ暦では1225年なので、そのように表記しています。/拝領: terms欄の訳語は文脈に合わないため、別の訳出をしています。
sen.e: It is presumed that the kanji (Chinese characters) '義' used in his first name Yoshikage (義景) was borrowed from the first name of Yoshitoki HOJO (北条義時) who died in 1225 when Yoshikage was 15 years old.

It is presumed that the kanji (Chinese characters) '義' used in his first name Yoshikage (義景) was borrowed from the first name of Yoshitoki HOJO (北条義時) who died in 1225 when Yoshikage was 15 years old.

sen.j: 義時晩年の頃に元服したと思われる。
sen.e: Yoshikage is considered to have celebrated his attainment of manhood in Yoshitoki's later years.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Yoshikage is considered to have celebrated his attainment of manhood in Yoshitoki's later years.
Yoshikage is considered to have celebrated his attainment of manhood in Yoshitoki's later years.

sen.j: 北条泰時から北条経時と北条時頼三代の執権に仕え、評定衆の一人として重用された。
sen.e: Yoshikage served three successive regents, i.e. Yasutoki HOJO, Tsunetoki HOJO and Tokiyori HOJO, and he was taken into confidence as a hyojoshu (a member of Council of State)
sen.cmt: 重用された: terms欄の訳語は文構造に合わないため、新和英中辞典第4版（研究社）の訳語を使用しています。
sen.e: Yoshikage served three successive regents, i.e. Yasutoki HOJO, Tsunetoki HOJO and Tokiyori HOJO, and he was taken into confidence as a hyojoshu (a member of Council of State).
sen.cmt: 文末にピリオドを挿入しました。
sen.e: Yoshikage served three successive regents, i.e. Yasutoki HOJO, Tsunetoki HOJO and Tokiyori HOJO, and he was taken into confidence as a hyojoshu (a member of Council of State).

sen.j: 幕府内では北条氏、三浦氏に次ぐ地位にあった。
sen.e: He ranked after the Hojo clan and the Miura clan in the bakufu.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処/幕府: カッコ内の説明は既に記載済なので、省略しています。
sen.e: He ranked after the Hojo clan and the Miura clan in the bakufu.
He ranked after the Hojo clan and the Miura clan in the bakufu.

sen.j: 4代将軍藤原頼経にも親しく仕えた。
sen.e: He also served the fourth Shogun FUJIWARA no Yoritsune closely.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処/4代将軍: terms欄の訳語は数字表記ですが、用語統一リストに従い、スペルアウトしています。
sen.e: He also served the fourth Shogun FUJIWARA no Yoritsune closely.
He also served the fourth Shogun FUJIWARA no Yoritsune closely.

sen.j: 将軍御所の和歌会などに加わっている。
sen.e: He joined a gathering of waka (Japanese poetry) held at the Shogun's palace, etc.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処/和歌会: 定訳は不明ですが、新和英中辞典第4版（研究社）の「歌会」の訳語等を参考にして訳出しています。
sen.e: He joined a gathering of waka (Japanese poetry) held at the Shogun's palace, etc.
He joined a gathering of waka (Japanese poetry) held at the Shogun's palace, etc.

sen.j: この頃の将軍家・北条・三浦・安達の関係は微妙である。
sen.e: Relations among the Shogun family, the Hojo, Miura and Adachi clans were touchy at that time.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Relations among the Shogun family, the Hojo, Miura and Adachi clans were touchy at that time.
Relations among the Shogun family, the Hojo, Miura and Adachi clans were touchy at that time.

sen.j: 三浦氏は親将軍派、反得宗の立場である。
sen.e: The stance of the Miura clan was pro-Shogun and anti-Tokuso (the patrimonial head of the main branch of the Hojo clan).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処/得宗: terms欄の訳語に、用語集の初出の場合の説明を加えています。
sen.e: The stance of the Miura clan was pro-Shogun and anti-Tokuso (the patrimonial head of the main branch of the Hojo clan).
The stance of the Miura clan was pro-Shogun and anti-Tokuso (the patrimonial head of the main branch of the Hojo clan).

sen.j: (それ)に対し、義景は北条氏縁戚として執権政治を支える立場にあった。
sen.e: On the other hand, Yoshikage was in a position to support the regency as a relative of the Hojo clan.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処(文分割で不完全な文になったため、文頭カッコ内に必要な語句を補っています)
sen.e: On the other hand, Yoshikage was in a position to support the regency as a relative of the Hojo clan.
On the other hand, Yoshikage was in a position to support the regency as a relative of the Hojo clan.

sen.j: 父景盛が出家してから17年後、将軍頼経が上洛した。
sen.e: The Shogun Yoritsune had gone to the capital (Kyoto) after 17 years since Yoshikage's father Kagemori entered into priesthood.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The Shogun Yoritsune went to the capital (Kyoto) after 17 years since Yoshikage's father Kagemori had entered into priesthood.
The Shogun Yoritsune went to the capital (Kyoto) after 17 years since Yoshikage's father Kagemori had entered into priesthood.

sen.j: (その)年に、義景は29歳で秋田城介を継承する。
sen.e: Yoshikage inherited Akitajo no suke (provincial governor of Akita-jo castle in Dewa Province) at the age of 29 in that year.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処(文分割で不完全な文になったため、文頭カッコ内に必要な語句を補っています)/秋田城介: terms欄の訳語に、用語集の初出の場合の説明を加えています。
sen.e: Yoshikage inherited Akitajo no suke (provincial governor of Akita-jo castle in Dewa Province) at the age of 29 in that year.
Yoshikage inherited Akitajo no suke (provincial governor of Akita-jo castle in Dewa Province) at the age of 29 in that year.

sen.j: 仁治3年（1242年）、執権泰時の命を受けて後嵯峨天皇の擁立工作を行なった。
sen.e: In 1242, he maneuvered to enthrone Emperor Gosaga by order of the regent Yasutoki.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: In 1242, he maneuvered to enthrone the Emperor Gosaga on the order of Regent Yasutoki.
sen.cmt: "Emperor Gosaga"→"the"を付けました。（用語統一リスト）"by order of"→"on the order of""regent"はタイトルなので頭文字を大文字にしました。
sen.e: In 1242, he maneuvered to enthrone the Emperor Gosaga on the order of Regent Yasutoki.

sen.j: 新帝推挙の使節となった。
sen.e: Yoshikage became an envoy to recommend him as the new emperor.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Yoshikage became an envoy to recommend him as the new emperor.
Yoshikage became an envoy to recommend him as the new emperor.

sen.j: 寛元4年（1246年）の宮騒動で執権北条時頼と図った。
sen.e: As Miya sodo (failed attempt at rebellion) occurred in 1246, he plotted with the regent Tokiyori HOJO.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処/宮騒動: 6/22の用語メールでご連絡しました通り、「(failed attempt…)」に修正し、用語統一リストに従いハイフンを削除しています。
sen.e: As Miya Sodo (failed attempt at rebellion) occurred in 1246, he plotted with Regent Tokiyori HOJO.
sen.cmt: 「宮騒動」→固有名詞として各語の頭文字を大文字にしました。"regent"はタイトルなので頭文字を大文字にしました。
sen.e: As Miya Sodo (failed attempt at rebellion) occurred in 1246, he plotted with Regent Tokiyori HOJO.

sen.j: 反得宗派の北条光時らの追放に関与した。
sen.e: He was involved in banishing Mitsutoki HOJO and others who opposed Tokuso.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: He was involved in banishing Mitsutoki HOJO and others who opposed Tokuso.
He was involved in banishing Mitsutoki HOJO and others who opposed Tokuso.

sen.j: 将軍家を擁する三浦氏と執権北条時頼の対立は、三浦泰村と義景の覇権争いでもあった。
sen.e: The confrontation between the Miura clan that supported the Shogun family, and the regent Tokiyori HOJO also suggested a struggle for supremacy between Yasumura MIURA and Yoshikage.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処/覇権: 「覇権争い」という熟語が存在するため(英辞郎 on the Web)、こちらを使用しています。
sen.e: The confrontation between the Miura clan that supported the Shogun family, and Regent Tokiyori HOJO also suggested a struggle for supremacy between Yasumura MIURA and Yoshikage.
sen.cmt: "regent"はタイトルなので頭文字を大文字にしました。
sen.e: The confrontation between the Miura clan that supported the Shogun family, and Regent Tokiyori HOJO also suggested a struggle for supremacy between Yasumura MIURA and Yoshikage.

sen.j: 宝治元年（1247年）、三浦氏との対立に業を煮やして鎌倉に戻った父景盛から厳しく叱咤されている。
sen.e: In 1247, Yoshikage was scolded harshly by his father Kagemori who became irritated at the confrontation with the Miura clan and thus came back to Kamakura.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: In 1247, Yoshikage was scolded harshly by his father Kagemori who became irritated at the confrontation with the Miura clan and thus came back to Kamakura.
In 1247, Yoshikage was scolded harshly by his father Kagemori who became irritated at the confrontation with the Miura clan and thus came back to Kamakura.

sen.j: 宝治合戦では嫡子泰盛と共に先陣を切って戦い、三浦氏を滅亡に追い込んだ。
sen.e: Yoshikage and his legitimate child Yasumori took the lead in fighting in the Battle of Hoji to destroy the Miura clan.
Yoshikage and his heir Yasumori took the lead in fighting in the Battle of Hoji to destroy the Miura clan.
sen.cmt: 「嫡子」→"legitimate child"だと「（庶子ではなく）嫡出子」なので、ここでは跡取りの意味で"heir"が良いと思います。
sen.e: Yoshikage and his heir Yasumori took the lead in fighting in the Battle of Hoji to destroy the Miura clan.

sen.j: 時頼の得宗専制体制に尽力した義景は格別の地位を保った。
sen.e: Yoshikage who made efforts to establish the tyranny of the patrimonial head of the main branch of the Hojo clan maintained a special position.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Yoshikage who made efforts to establish the tyranny of the patrimonial head of the main branch of the Hojo clan maintained a special position.
Yoshikage who made efforts to establish the tyranny of the patrimonial head of the main branch of the Hojo clan maintained a special position.

sen.j: 時頼の嫡子北条時宗は義景の妹である松下禅尼の邸で誕生している。
sen.e: Tokimune HOJO, a legitimate child of Tokiyori, was born at the residence of Matsushita zenni, a younger sister of Yoshikage.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Tokimune HOJO, the heir of Tokiyori, was born at the residence of Matsushita zenni, a younger sister of Yoshikage.
sen.cmt: 「嫡子」→"legitimate child"だと「（庶子ではなく）嫡出子」なので、ここでは跡取りの意味で"heir"が良いと思います。
sen.e: Tokimune HOJO, the heir of Tokiyori, was born at the residence of Matsushita zenni, a younger sister of Yoshikage.

sen.j: 義景の正室は北条時房の娘である。
sen.e: The lawful wife of Yoshikage is a daughter of Tokifusa HOJO.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The lawful wife of Yoshikage is a daughter of Tokifusa HOJO.
The lawful wife of Yoshikage is a daughter of Tokifusa HOJO.

sen.j: その妻との間に産まれた娘（覚山尼）は時宗の正室となる。
sen.e: Kakusan ni, a daughter of him and his lawful wife, became the lawful wife of Tokimune.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Kakusan ni, a daughter of him and his lawful wife, became the lawful wife of Tokimune.
Kakusan ni, a daughter of him and his lawful wife, became the lawful wife of Tokimune.

sen.j: また、長井氏、二階堂氏、武藤氏など有力御家人との間にも幅広い血縁関係を築いた。
sen.e: Yoshikage also built various blood ties with senior vassals such as the Nagai, Nikaido, Muto and other clans.
sen.cmt: 血縁関係: terms欄の訳語の「relationship」は複数形にできないため、英辞郎 on the Webの別の訳語を使用しています。
sen.e: Yoshikage also built various blood ties with senior vassals such as the Nagai, Nikaido, Muto and other clans.
Yoshikage also built various blood ties with senior vassals such as the Nagai, Nikaido, Muto and other clans.

sen.j: 建長5年（1253年）5月に出家し、翌6月に44歳で死去。
sen.e: After he had become a priest in June 1253, he died at the age of 44 in July of that year.
sen.cmt: 建長5年（1253年）5月、6月: グレゴリオ暦ではそれぞれ「6月」「7月」ですので、そのように訳しています。
sen.e: After he had become a Buddhist priest in June 1253, he died at the age of 44 in July of that year.
After he had become a Buddhist priest in June 1253, he died at the age of 44 in July of that year.

sen.j: 父景盛と義景が築いた安達氏の地位は、子の安達泰盛の代に全盛を迎えた。
sen.e: The position of the Adachi clan that had been attained by his father Kagemori and Yoshikage was improved most in the time of Yoshikage's child, Yasumori ADACHI.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処/全盛: terms欄の訳語は文脈に合わないため、別の訳出をしています。
sen.e: The position of the Adachi clan that had been attained by his father Kagemori and Yoshikage was improved most in the time of Yoshikage's child, Yasumori ADACHI.

sen.j: 時宗政権下で権勢を振るうこととなる。
sen.e: The Adachi clan came to exert power under the regime of Tokimune.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処/権勢: terms欄の訳語は文脈に合わないため、新和英中辞典第4版[研究社]の訳語を使用しています。
